title: Aunt Dot's Cookbook Collection of Pies & Cobblers
description: Aunt Dot's Pie & Cobblers Recipes from her Cookbook Collection have the most delicious pie to die for with flaky crusts and sweet homemade cobbler recipes! These recipes are the ultimate desserts and some of the most favorite savory treats. Aunt Dot created these classic pie and cobbler recipes to share her love of baking the best desserts out there. Each of Aunt Dot's cookbooks walk the baker through each step of the recipe. The pies and cobblers cookbook adds to the list of many other cookbooks in Aunt Dot's Cookbook Collection series.
author: Dorothy Hawkes
